name: Robo in Time (Nz_TelaStudio)
description:
Nz Tela Studio

Unity Programmer : Heldi Arisandi

Game Desain & Game Artis : Feraro Rizal Dewangga 

Device : Mobile/SmartPhone  (Android)

Robo In Time tells the story of the adventures of Cexxa and Mexxa on Planet is blue. Which of their main tasks is to take power by collecting coins for make it safe on the Blue Planet. This power is useful for eliminate the traces of enemies that exist on this blue planet, so it doesn't will bother again. Because the enemy has been settled since old or stay long and do mischief on the colored Planet blue. Therefore, Checkxa and Mexxa want to return the Blue Planet be clean, safe and comfortable by surviving the enemy and fight the obstacles that exist to the next level as well take the power of a coin to restore comfort. This Robo In Time takes the Sci-FI-action theme and focuses on 2D platformer level that prioritizes switching characters directly making it possible to change characters directly in gameplay.

Can be played on  Smartphone Device (Android)

COMPFEST 14 - Indie Game Ignite NZ Tela Studio

 - Feraro Rizal Dewangga

 - Heldi Arisandi
